Announcements

Pre-Registration Open!

September 5, 2017

We are proud to announce that we will be hosting the 2nd Annual Penn Invitational on February 17, 2018. Official Registration for the tournament will open on September 15, 2017. Registration will again be done through the Ezra platform. Looking forward to seeing you in February!

Best wishes,
The SOUP Team

Science Olympiad at the University of Pennsylvania
